participant_1.name: Mike Johnson
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and easygoing, Mike enjoys sharing stories and laughs with friends.
participant_1.background: I weight 300 pounds. I like candy and soda. I like the movie godfather. I am not healthy. I am a man.

participant_2.name: Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Curious and adventurous, Emily has a passion for learning and exploring new things.
participant_2.background: I only have three best friends. My favorite thing to do is research race cars in my free time. I am a girl who loves sports cars and video games. I am a fourteen year old living with my mom and grandparents.
